recipesJson.name: Croissant Pudding with Mixed berries
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
Created for Christmas fresh ‘Tacular
st Judes Waffle!  
Croissant  with mixed berries pudding. 
After 24 hour steep, absolutely delicious. I recommend adding .25% Sweetener of your choice to make Forest mix really shine.

reviews.text: I am not sure how to rate this.  The flavor is good, but I am going to have to single flavor test 2 of the flavors as I had a reaction to one of the flavors.  I have the same reaction to super sweet, so there must be a similar chemical make-up in one of the flavors.  Just thought I would give the warning if anyone else has that problem.
I have been vaping this ALL DAY, which I never do. Bravo! Wonderful berry filled buttery pudding. Can’t get better than that!
